name: Boomer Rampage
description: Boomer Rampage is a puzzle game in which we control the boomers rocket hand. Our task is to destroy the target, avoiding enemies, traps and walls in all the 90 levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7-8-10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual Core or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: integrated video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 40 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7-8-10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: integrated video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 40 MB available space
